name: Forecasting & Modelling
description: Research focussed on forecasting the spread or modelling the dynamics of the virus

name: Disease Spread
description: Research documenting cases of virus spread through and between communities or countries

name: Transmission
description: Research studying the means of transmission of the virus

name: Prevalence
description: Research studying the level of infections in different communities

name: Surveillance
description: Research developing methods for surveillance of the disease spread

name: Diagnostics
description: Research developing and testing methods to diagnose the virus

name: Prevention
description: Research examining tools for slowing the spread of the virus (e.g. PPE)

name: Preparedness
description: Research on strategies for a country, healthcare system or hospital to prepare for a pandemic

name: Risk Factors
description: Research examining risk factors for infection and severe symptoms

name: Symptoms
description: Research discussing the different symptoms of the virus

name: Case Reports
description: Case reports of single or multiple patients discussing their clinical course

name: Pediatrics
description: Research studying the effect of the virus on children

name: Medical Disciplines
description: Research focussing on the effect of the virus on a specific medical discipline

name: Healthcare Workers
description: Research studying the effect of the virus on healthcare workers

name: Imaging
description: Research documenting CT and other scans of patients
